## Lab 7: Multiple Regression

The goal of this lab is not only to perform a multiple regression
analysis but also to understand and interpret the results in the context
of a research question.

In this lab you will gain experience:

-   Fitting a multiple regression model
-   Interpreting the results of your multiple regression analysis
-   Testing assumptions of multiple regression
-   Reporting a multiple regression analysis

To access the lab: [click here](https://classroom.github.com/a/A1sR4WdE)
